entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except easterly 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
